summary: This mod makes vanila races more lore-based and immersive. It changes race abilities, skills, starting spells and more.
descriptionHtml:
[b][b][font=Tahoma][color=#000000][size=5][center][b][b][font=Tahoma][color=#000000][size=5][img]http://i.imgur.com/uJcie7i.png[/img][/size][/color][/font][/b][/b][/center][/size][/color][/font][/b][/b][color=#ff0000][size=5]Requirements:[/size][/color]
[list]
[*][size=2]TES V: Skyrim v 1.9.32 (DLC's not required)[/size]
[*][size=2]skse v 1.7.3+[/size]
[/list]

This mod trying to make Skyrim races more lore-based, changing race abilities, starting spells, stats and more. All races now have main skill, that growing 25% faster exept High Elves, who have three main skills, but have only 10% boost. Not all races have first spell in the begining.

[size=5][center][color=#ffff00]Race Description[/color][/center][/size][color=#ff7700][size=4][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/yGtSP2G.png[/img][/center][/size][/color][size=3][color=#6aa84f] [color=#6aa84f]Skills:[/color]
[/color]

[list]
[*][size=3][color=#00ffff]Lockpicking +10 (Main)[/color][/size]
[*][color=#00ff00][size=3]Illusion +5[/size][/color]
[*][color=#00ff00][size=3]Light Armour +5[/size][/color]
[*][color=#00ff00][size=3]One-handed +5[/size][/color]
[*][color=#00ff00][size=3]Alteration +5[/size][/color]
[*][color=#00ff00][size=3]Alchemy +5[/size][/color]
[/list]
[color=#cc0000]Abilities:[/color]
[color=#ffff00]
Histskin(active):
[list]
[*][size=3]Invoke the power of the Hist to recover health ten times faster.[/size]
[/list] [/color][color=#ff7700]Argonian Blood(passive):
[list]
[*][size=3]Argonian blood makes argonians invulnerable to diseases(75% resist) and poison(100% resist) damage.[/size]
[/list] Amphibian(passive):
[list]
[*][size=3]Increases swimming speed by 50% and gain waterbeathing.[/size]
[/list] [/color][list]
[/list] [/size]
[size=3] Stats:[/size]

[*][size=3][/size]
[size=3][color=#ff7700]Health: 100[/color][/size]
[*][size=3][color=#00ff00]Magicka: 150[/color][/size]
[*][size=3][color=#ff0000]Stamina: 50[/color][/size]
[*][color=#ff7700][size=3]Carry Weight: 200[/size][/color]
[*][size=3][color=#ff7700]Health Regen: 0.7/sec[/color][/size]
[*][size=3][color=#ff0000]Magicka Regen: 2.0/sec[/color][/size]
[*][color=#ff0000][size=3]Stamina Regen: 4.0/sec[/size][/color]


[color=#ffff00][size=3]Starting spell: Healing[/size][/color]
[color=#ff7700][size=4][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/TuWu456.png[/img][/center][/size][/color] [size=3] [color=#6aa84f]Skills:[/color]

[color=#00ffff]Conjuration +10 (Main)[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Restoration +10[/color]
[color=#00ff00]Illusion +5[/color][color=#00ff00]
[/color] [color=#00ff00]Alchemy +5
Alteration +5
[/color]
[color=#f1c232]Abilities:[/color]
[color=#ffff00]
Dragonskin(active):
[/color][list]
[*][color=#ffff00][size=3]Absorb 50% of enemy spells power.[/size][/color]
[/list][/size][size=3] [color=#ff7700]Magic Resistance(passive):
[/color][list]
[*][color=#ff7700][size=3]+25% Magic Resistance.[/size][/color]
[/list][color=#ff7700] Gift of Magnus(passive):
[/color][list]
[*][color=#ff7700][size=3]+50% Magicka[/size][/color]
[/list][color=#3d85c6] [/color]
Stats:

[color=#ff7700]Health: 100
[/color] [color=#ff7700]Magicka: 100[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Stamina: 50[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Carry Weight: 180[/color]
[color=#ff7700]Health Regen: 0.7/sec[/color]
[color=#00ff00] Magicka Regen: 4.0/sec[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Stamina Regen: 4.0/sec[/color]

[color=#ffff00]Starting spell: Conjure Familiar[/color][/size]
[size=3] [/size] [color=#ff7700][size=4][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/dhOiwAT.png[/img][/center][/size][/color] [size=3][color=#6aa84f]Skills:[/color]

[color=#00ffff]Destruction +10 (Main)[/color]

[color=#00ff00]Light Armour +5[/color]
[color=#00ff00]Block +5[/color]

[color=#f1c232]Abilities:[/color]

[color=#ffff00]Ancestor's Wrath(active):
[/color][list]
[*][color=#ffff00][size=3]Opponents that get too close take fire damage(8|40 on 30+ level).[/size][/color]
[/list] [color=#ff7700]Resist Fire:
[/color][list]
[*][color=#ff7700][size=3]+50% Fire Resist[/size][/color]
[/list]
Stats:
[color=#3d85c6] [/color]

[color=#ff0000]Magicka Regen: 2.5/sec[/color]
[color=#ff0000] Stamina Regen: 3.5/sec[/color][/size]

[size=3][color=#ffff00]Starting spell: Flames[/color][/size]
[color=#ff7700][size=4][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/3c5TDfj.png[/img][/center][/size][/color] [size=3][color=#6aa84f]Skills:[/color]

[color=#00ff00]Enchanting +5 (Main)[/color]

[color=#ff7700]Highborn(passive):
[list]
[*][size=3]Altmer are born with disease resist for 75%, but have 25% weaknes to fire, shock and frost. Also they haveÂ [/size]
[/list] 50% of common magic weakness.
Gift of Magnus(passive):
[list]
[*][size=3]+150% Magicka[/size]
[/list] [/color]

[/color][list]

[/color][list]
